com.mygdx.game

Class GameScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
      • com.mygdx.game.GameScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor, com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class GameScreen
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
implements com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
    Game screen. Draws all the views of all objects of the game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      float gameTimer
      Float variable that keeps the number of seconds that passed since the level has started
      boolean gamewon
      gamewon tells if the level was won.
      static float PIXEL_TO_METER
      Each pixel shows "PIXEL_TO_METER" meters.
      static float VIEWPORT_HEIGHT
      Viewport height (meters).
      static float VIEWPORT_WIDTH
      Viewport width (meters).
